sellBoxHeading1: Get a price estimate for your device
sellBoxHeading2: Deliver your device to the nearest store, or send it for free

sellBoxDesc1: Quickly evaluate your phone and get a price offer in 2 minutes.
sellBoxDesc2: We will send you a sales pack within 1-3 working days. The package contains everything you need to send the device for free.
sellBoxDesc3: After receiving your phone, it will take 2-3 working days for inspection. We will then transfer your money on the same day or send you an email with an adjusted price quote.
reviewDescription1: I bought a refurbished PlayStation 5, and it looks and works like new! The delivery was super fast, and the customer support team ...
reviewDescription2: Amazing service! The refurbished iPhone I bought was practically new. Customer service was prompt and friendly. Will shop again.
reviewDescription3: Fast delivery, great product quality, and very helpful customer service. Thank you for an awesome experience!
